parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

- **PrePaid**: subscription

- **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version of the instance. Valid values: **5.0**, **4.4**, **4.2**, **4.0**, and **3.4**.

parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description:
The instance type. For more information about the instance types available for different instance architectures, see:

- [Standalone instance types](~~311407~~)

- [Replica set instance types](~~311410~~)

- [Sharded cluster instance types](~~311414~~)

<props="china">

> This parameter is not required for Serverless instances.

</props>

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance whose overview you want to query.

> - If you do not specify this parameter, an overview of all instances in your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.
>
> - You can specify multiple instance IDs. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: InstanceStatus
parameters.description: The status of the instance. For more information, see [Instance states](~~63870~~).

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance architecture. Valid values:

- **sharding**: sharded cluster instance

- **replicate**: replica set or standalone instance

<props="china">

- **serverless**: Serverless instance

</props>


> * Set this parameter as needed. For example, to query the overview of a sharded cluster instance, set this parameter to **sharding**.
>
> * If you do not specify this parameter, an overview of all instances is returned.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

- **Classic**: classic network

- **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Call [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) to query the latest region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For more information about resource groups, see [View basic information about a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: ShowTags
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return instance tags. The default value is false.
